mapper.update: update IM_METADATA set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into IM_METADATA (PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.update: update IM_METADATA set DS_ID = #{dsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TB_NAME = #{tbName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0'
select PK_ID, DS_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, TB_NAME, STATUS, TYPE from IM_METADATA where DEL_FLG = '0' and NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
